subject: Create Control Plane Database Schema
description:
Create comprehensive database migration script for control_plane schema including:
- projects table (with org_id, status, environment)
- project_services (service enablement)
- organizations table
- organization_members (with roles)
- Enhanced api_keys (key_type, scopes, environment, usage tracking)
- quotas table (monthly limits vs hard caps)
- usage_snapshots (metrics tracking)
- jobs table (background job queue)
- idempotency_keys (duplicate protection)
- audit_logs (who did what when)
- feature_flags (kill switches)
- secrets (versioned with rotation)
- And all other Phase 0 tables

Script should be idempotent and support rollback.
